Hero.title: Innovating at scale. Welcome to Hello Galaxy

LogoCarrousel.title: We work with the best technologies

projects.description2: These projects showcase our expertise through real-world examples. Each one in production demonstrates our ability to solve complex problems, work with diverse technologies, and manage projects effectively.

project1.description: We built the Deville Argentina Shopify store: organized the content, created categories, and implemented multiple payment methods to deliver a secure and efficient shopping experience.

project2.description: Range is a platform that enables creating alerts and monitoring multiple blockchain networks and cryptocurrency wallets in real time, with detailed transaction analysis and customized reports.

project3.description: We created the landing page for attorney Antoninette Bone, featuring a professional design and optimized usability that highlights her legal services, builds trust, and facilitates new client acquisition.

project4.description: We developed the Carpintería Robaina landing page: produced persuasive content, optimized SEO, and integrated advanced, dynamic technologies to showcase their services and attract clients.

project5.description: We designed the Chatbot AI landing page: crafted an intuitive interface, deployed the bot for 24/7 automated support, and maximized visitor-to-customer conversion.

project6.description: We created Pet’s Love, a platform for animal lovers that facilitates adoptions, shares care tips, and connects users with online veterinarians to ensure their pets’ well-being.

SolutionShowcase.title: Simple and effective solutions
SolutionShowcase.description: We create modern, responsive, results-driven websites. From landing pages to full portals, always with a UX/UI focus. We help you digitize your business and optimize your cloud data usage.

solution1.title: Web Design & Development
solution1.description: Personalize your customer service with AI-powered bots that answer questions, provide technical support, and drive sales.

solution2.title: Custom Web Applications
solution2.description: We develop scalable, secure web solutions to automate processes, manage data, and improve operational efficiency.

solution3.title: Cloud Infrastructure
solution3.description: We configure your cloud infrastructure and organize your data using tools like Google Sheets, Firestore, BigQuery, and AWS.

solution4.title: Online Stores
solution4.description: We launch your e-commerce on platforms like Shopify and Tiendanube, integrating design, payments, and custom features.

solution5.title: Instagram Marketing
solution5.description: We create engaging visual content—posts, reels, and stories—that connect with your audience and strengthen your brand.

solution6.title: Automation & Chatbots
solution6.description: We implement automated workflows with bots for customer service, lead generation, or internal management. Simplify repetitive tasks with intelligent technology.

InteractiveDemo.title: Try Hello Galaxy
InteractiveDemo.description: Discover how our technology enhances customer service and improves your team’s efficiency.

FeatureHighlight.title: Why Choose Hello Galaxy
FeatureHighlight.description: Our solutions stand out for their simplicity, effectiveness, and adaptability.

feature1.title: Full customization
feature1.description: Configure the chatbot to meet your business’s specific needs.

feature2.title: Clear and flexible pricing
feature2.description: Choose a plan that fits the size and demands of your operation.

feature3.title: Guaranteed scalability
feature3.description: Handle from 1,000 to 100,000 conversations per month, adapting to your business’s growth.

feature4.title: Complete integration
feature4.description: Easily connect with Meta, Google Sheets, and Chatwoot to optimize every interaction.

TerminalAI.title: Try our AI-powered chat to get to know us
TerminalAI.description: Ask about our services, solutions, or projects.

CallToAction.title: Ready to accelerate your business growth?
CallToAction.description: Let’s create powerful digital solutions together and take your business to the next level.
